item.title: UF21: Mickey Gall and Rob Dyrdek
item.description: Mickey Gall calls in ahead of his UFC 203 fight against CM Punk to give his thoughts on what Punk's gameplan will be against him, making the most of his fifteen minutes in the Octagon, and training with the Miller Brothers. Later, skateboarder, producer, entrepreneur, and reality TV star, Rob Dyrdek calls in to discuss creating a lifetime highlight reel, chasing good energy, being a Chuck Liddell fan, Nate vs. Conor 2, rapid title changes, and a lot more.

item.title: UF20: Paige VanZant and Kurt Metzger
item.description: Paige VanZant calls in before her UFC On Fox 21 fight against Bec Rawlings and discusses her fighting roots, Dancing with the Stars, Forrest Griffin as one of her favorite fighters, and learning from her loss to Rose Namajunas. Also, comic and Inside Amy Schumer writer, Kurt Metzger, joins Jim and Matt in studio to talk about the controversy he's faced over the last couple of weeks. Plus, the guys catch up and break down Condit vs. Maia.

item.title: UF19: Dana White and Amy Schumer
item.description: UFC President Dana White joins Jim and Matt to discuss UFC 202, a possible Rumble Johnson vs. Jon Jones fight, Ronda Rousey's status for UFC in NYC, Dana's thoughts on moving forward without the Fertittas, MMA in the Olympics, and much, much more. Then, comic, actress, and author Amy Schumer sits down in studio with the guys to discuss her new book, "The Girl With The Lower Back Tattoo", filming with Goldie Hawn, Kurt Metzger, looking like Holly Holm, and much more.

item.title: UF16: Joe Rogan and Larry King
item.description: Jim takes calls from UFC commentator, stand up comic, and podcast host, Joe Rogan, and broadcast legend, Larry King on this episode of UFC Unfiltered. Joe discusses Donald Trump, GSP's potential return to the Octagon, weight-cutting, title changes, Ronda Rousey, and a lot more. Later, Larry talks with Jim about his conversations with Martin Luther King, Malcolm X, Jackie Robinson, Muhammad Ali, and the state of affairs in modern politics, amongst other things. Don't miss this one!

item.title: UF15: Eddie Alvarez
item.description: Newly-crowned UFC Lightweight Champion Eddie Alvarez joins Jim in studio this week, while Matt calls in from the road, as he’s off shooting Dana White: Lookin’ For A Fight. Eddie talks about wanting to fight the winner of Diaz vs. McGregor at UFC 202, getting excited about feeling fear heading into a fight, and more. Plus, Jim breaks down UFC Fight Night: Rodriguez vs. Caceres and talks about getting to work with Robert De Niro a little bit on a new film. Check it out, and enjoy.

item.title: UF6: Stipe Miocic and UFC 200 Preview
item.description: Jim and Matt react to Jon Jones being pulled from his UFC 200 fight against Daniel Cormier after a potential USADA violation. UFC Heavyweight Champion Stipe Miocic calls in to preview the weekend of fights. And, Jim talks about watching Andrew Dice Clay lose a ton of money once upon a time. Check it out, and enjoy.

item.title: UF5: Miesha Tate and David Benioff & D. B. Weiss
item.description: Miesha Tate calls in to discuss her UFC 200 title fight against Amanda Nunes and Game Of Thrones writers and producers David Benioff and D. B. Weiss call in to discuss the show with Jim and Matt. Plus, Matt talks about a rematch with Matt Hughes, and Jim talks about wanting to be Dan Henderson at a movie theater. Check it out.

item.title: UF4: Jon Jones
item.description: Jon Jones joins Jim and Matt to discuss his Light Heavyweight title fight versus Daniel Cormier at UFC 200. Plus, the guys break down The Ultimate Fighter Finale: Joanna vs. Claudia and discuss dramatic Twitter hashtags, Bill Cosby, and Drake lyrics, amongst other things. Check it out.

item.title: UF3: Daniel Cormier and Mike Judge
item.description: Daniel Cormier and Mike Judge join the show this week, as Mike discusses his animated short "Cormier vs. Jones 2" and the dangers of living in Albuquerque, New Mexico, and DC talks about his upcoming fight with Jon Jones at UFC 200, what it's like when teammates lose, and more much. Plus, Jim and Matt talk about Game Of Thrones and Jim's performance at a roast over the weekend.

item.title: UF2: CM Punk and The Rock
item.description: CM Punk calls in to make a big announcement about his UFC debut and The Rock joins the guys to discuss his movie Central Intelligence, Brock Lesnar, UFC 200, and more. Plus, the guys make predictions and discuss UFC Fight Night: Dos Anjos vs. Alvarez.
